section.title: Layers
section.para: We can support layers in a drawing by treating layers as a special kind of figures.
Since we want to represent a drawing as a tree structure, we can require the following:

listitem.para: A Layer can only have of a parent of type Drawing.
Any other type of Figure can only have of a parent that is not of type Drawing.

section.title: Trade-off
section.para: The trade-off with this design is that we always must add at least one layer to a drawing, even if we don't need layers in that specific drawing.
